data.name: Soul Split
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Soul Split is a PSX styled action rogue-lite dungeon crawler following an amnesiac sorcerer who’s previous actions broke the cycle of life and death. Conscripted into the service of Death itself, you’ll delve into a vast dungeon overflowing with magic and monsters to “clean up your mess.”

Build an Arsenal of Chaos


Scavenge for materials around the world to craft a powerful arsenal of spells. Collect lost tomes dropped by enemies and bosses to add their move sets to your own. With eight different elements covering every imaginable category of magic, there are countless ways to burn your path through these twisted lands.

Haunted By Your Past


A unique case among the deathless, upon enduring fatal injuries your soul splits in two. As a result of this anomaly, a ghost of your past self will fight along side you to the location where your soul had previously split. Recovering your soul restores your spare life, but failing to do so will send you crawling back to the surface.

Explore a Deathless World


Delve deep into a subterranean world that has been warped and twisted by its many powerful inhabitants. Witness the fallout of Death himself no longer holding dominion over these lands. Uncover the secrets of these buried civilizations and right your wrongs by reintroducing death to this ailing world, before it gets swallowed by something far worse.

On Behalf of The Reaper


You've played a fatal role in a dangerous ritual that shattered the balance between life and death, leaving you as the last of the dead. For your hand in this plot, Death itself dredged you back up from the afterlife and has contracted you to clean up your mess. There will be no rest for you until balance is restored to these shattered lands. Once your end of the contract is fulfilled, then maybe, just maybe, you'll be able to save your soul.

Features


  • Explosive, fast paced, and chaotic combat
  • An in-depth story adapted to the roguelike format
  • Explore a mysterious subterranean world brimming with a diverse cast of horrific foes
  • Several Intense and viscous boss fights
  • A sandbox of over 100 spells split between 8 core elements
  • A wide variety of strange and charming characters
  • A second chance in the form of a ghost of your past life
  • An in depth and intuitive spell crafting system
  • An old school PSX aesthetic with a modern flourish
  • An epic greater narrative told in fragments found throughout the world
